name: Super Plat
description:
Super Plat, platforming mini adventure in a single level .Unlock the rest of the level by getting the strawberry's. Due to time constraints there is no audio yet and the level design leaves much to be desired, updates will be out soon though so stay tuned.

All art assets are from "Pixel Adventure" pack by Pixel frog check them here https://pixel-frog.itch.io/

CONTROLS: A-D & SPACE.
